Metadata.Title: CVE-2023-1668 affecting package openvswitch for versions less than 2.17.5-3
Metadata.Description: CVE-2023-1668 affecting package openvswitch for versions less than 2.17.5-3. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package openvswitch is earlier than 2.17.5-3, affected by CVE-2023-1668
